resources.string:
Established in 1997, Home of English International has emerged as Phnom Penh’s leading private children’s English school. 
 
 	 We offer a wide range of English programs from pre-school to high school. The student-centered English learning environments at our school produce confident, proficient speakers of English. 
 
 	 Visit us and discover why we are the first choice in education among Cambodia’s leading families.

Home of English International School Fees

Grades 1 - 4

Monthly $380

Term $1000

Annual $3700


Grades 5 - 8

Monthly $410

Term $1050

Annual $3850

string.name: about_title
string.b: Welcome to Home of English International School

resources.string: Early on Saturday, 21st of July 2018, 94 Home of English International Homeschooling Program students and 10 staff traveled to the Phnom Penh Safari World Park for a field trip. It was a sunny day, but not too hot. The students enjoyed the park’s animal shows and amenities until 2:30pm when it was time to get back in the minivans and return to the Home of English.
